spatial_accuracy.notes: Major failures in window and door placement. The living room fireplace is missing, replaced by standard walls. The front kitchen window is absent. Door orientations for Master Bedroom and Bedroom #3 are reversed or incorrectly placed.

structural_fidelity.notes: The tray ceiling in the Master Bedroom is rendered as a weird floor-level indentation rather than a ceiling feature. Hallucinated a double-bay garage door instead of the single large door. The connection between the kitchen and dining room lacks the specified pantry and range alcove geometry.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island geometry is significantly distorted and simplified compared to the angled blueprint design. Scale of the island is undersized relative to the room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean lighting and consistent wall thickness. Isometric camera angle is well-executed, though some minor geometry clipping occurs at wall intersections.

detected_errors.description: Living room fireplace and chimney bump-out totally missing.
Garage door split into two segments unlike the blueprint's single large door.
Kitchen island and sink area proportions do not match the specific angled blueprint footprint.
Hallucinated extra window in the Master Bath area and incorrect bathroom fixtures.
Master Bedroom door is placed on the wrong wall segment.
The Master Bedroom tray ceiling is rendered as a structural recessed floor pit.
